title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.label: What kind of work do you do?
questions.content: I specialize in full-stack web development using Vue, Nuxt, and Laravel. I build fast, maintainable websites and web apps, and can also help with performance optimization and technical consulting.

questions.label: Can you help me learn how to build websites?
questions.content: While I don't offer courses right now, I'm happy to share useful resources, guides, and tips to help you get started or improve your skills.

questions.label: What does a typical project cost?
questions.content: Pricing varies depending on project scope, features, and complexity. Most projects start at around €2,000, with typical budgets ranging from €3,000 to €10,000. For consulting or design work, I charge a day rate of €450.

questions.label: What’s your payment structure?
questions.content: I usually require a 40% upfront deposit to begin work. The remaining 60% is due upon project completion. Payment can be made via bank transfer, PayPal, or other common methods.

questions.label: How long does a project usually take?
questions.content: Timelines depend on the scope and complexity, but most projects are completed within 2 to 8 weeks.

questions.label: What do you enjoy most about your work?
questions.content: I enjoy constantly learning, solving real problems, and building things from scratch—especially when they’re used and appreciated by others.

questions.label: What do you do outside of work?
questions.content: I spend most of my free time with my family. I also enjoy cycling, swimming, home workouts, and going for long walks.
